sen.j: 三ツ鳥居（みつとりい）は、明神型鳥居3つを1つに組み合わせたもので、柱が4本になる為、四脚鳥居と呼ばれる事もある。
sen.e: Mitsutorii is a combination of three myojin-gata torii (A pillared gate-like entrance to a Shinto shrine), and it is sometimes called yotsuashi torii (four-legged torii) because it has four pillars.
sen.cmt: 「なる為。」は「なる為、」に訂正の上、下の行と結合。
sen.e: Mitsutorii is a combination of three myojin-gata torii (A pillared gate-like entrance to a Shinto shrine), and it is sometimes called yotsuashi torii (four-legged torii) because it has four pillars.
Mitsutorii is a combination of three myojin-gate torii (a pillared gate-like entrance to a Shinto shrine), and it is sometimes called yotsuashi torii (four-legged torii) because it has four pillars.
sen.cmt: 括弧内の説明を小文字から始めました。スペルを修正しました。

sen.e: Major Mitsutorii

Major Mitsutorii
Omiwa-jinja Shrine
Omiwa-jinja Shrine
Omiwa-jinja Shrine

sen.j: 大神神社の三ツ鳥居は禁則地の為、実際に見る事はできないが、大神神社の公式ホームページの「境内の案内－三ツ鳥居」には三ツ鳥居の模型の写真が掲載されている。
sen.e: Though the Mitsutorii in Omiwa-jinja Shrine cannot be actually seen because it is in the prohibited area, the official website of Omiwa-jinja Shrine has the picture of the model of Mitsutorii in 'Precincts Guide - Mitsutorii.'

Though the Mitsutorii in Omiwa-jinja Shrine cannot be actually seen because it is in the prohibited area, the official website of Omiwa-jinja Shrine has the picture of the model of Mitsutorii in 'Precincts Guide - Mitsutorii.'

Although the Mitsutorii in Omiwa-jinja Shrine cannot be actually seen because it is in the prohibited area, the official website of Omiwa-jinja Shrine has the picture of the model of Mitsutorii in 'Precincts Guide - Mitsutorii.'

sen.j: この大神神社の公式ホームページを見ても、三ツ鳥居の形式ができた年代や由来については不明と書かれている。
sen.e: The official website of Omiwa-jinja Shrine doesn't mention the period when the Mitsutorii was formed or its derivation.
The official website of Omiwa-jinja Shrine doesn't mention the period when the Mitsutorii was formed or its derivation.
The official website of Omiwa-jinja Shrine doesn't mention the period when the Mitsutorii was formed or its derivation.
Mitsumine-jinja Shrine
Mitsumine-jinja Shrine
Mitsumine-jinja Shrine

sen.j: 三峯神社の拝殿の手前に三ツ鳥居がある。
sen.e: There is Mitsutorii in front of the haiden (a hall of worship) of Mitsumine-jinja Shrine.
There is Mitsutorii in front of the haiden (a hall of worship) of Mitsumine-jinja Shrine.
There is Mitsutorii in front of the haiden (a hall of worship) of Mitsumine-jinja Shrine.

sen.j: 三峯神社の三ツ鳥居も由来などについて不明である。
sen.e: It is also unclear about the derivation of Mitsutorii of Mitsumine-jinja Shrine.
It is also unclear about the derivation of Mitsutorii of Mitsumine-jinja Shrine.
